description.displayText: I am so happy Pat came into our lives.  She was such a help when my mother fell unexpectedly ill and needed help around the house and help making doctor visits.  She is a true gem and we fell in love with her instantly.  We could not have gotten through this health scare without her caring support.
description.originalText: I am so happy Pat came into our lives.  She was such a help when my mother fell unexpectedly ill and needed help around the house and help making doctor visits.  She is a true gem and we fell in love with her instantly.  We could not have gotten through this health scare without her caring support.

description.displayText:
Patricia is a patient angel and a blessing to have in your home. Our job was very difficult as we have very unorganized home. Patricia was an angel who came in and assisted us. She is a miracle worker. She cleans and is very picky about cleanliness. She is proud to be going back to become a nurse so she has wonderful training an emergency care already.

On more than one occasion she helped with the assistance of my wife in bathing , care, and assistance when she fell.  Patricia continues to work for us and I hope she will come back after her injury.

She has gone above and beyond in many instances. She helped pack up and clear out our old home and move things into a storage unit. She also had the patience of Jobe to deal with a 77 year old who has short term memory loss. She has a great sense of humor as well. She is incredibly honest and you will never regret having her in your home.

description.displayText:
Patricia is a wonderful worker.  She is very compassionate, caring and a self starter.
I highly recommend her for employment.
Richard
